Name: Magical Monster Land
About the game: Magical Monster Land takes inspiration from various 16-bit platformers of the past and adds in a few modern elements. Momentum based platforming Steam Achievements Play with keyboard or a controller Option to rebind the controls 3 difficulty settings Each world has unique music and enemies Levels filled with secrets and no time limit, so you're free to explore World maps with branching paths Ability to replay levels to find secrets that you missed Collect Tokens to spend in the item shop or on mini games to earn extra lives 8 save files Collect Mystery Medals to unlock more levels Original soundtrack by Gustav Eriksson
